type.name: Imgs

property.name: BloomBlurRadius
property.summary: Gets or sets the HDR bloom blur radius.

property.name: BloomScale
property.summary: Gets or sets the HDR bloom scale.

property.name: BloomThreshold
property.summary: Gets or sets the HDR bloom threshold.

property.name: Brightness
property.summary: Gets or sets the cinematic brightness.

property.name: Contrast
property.summary: Gets or sets the conematic contrast.

property.name: DepthOfFieldBlurRadius
property.summary: Gets or sets the Depth of Field blur radius.

property.name: DepthOfFieldDistance
property.summary: Gets or sets the Depth of Field distance.

property.name: DepthOfFieldRange
property.summary: Gets or sets the Depth of Field range.

property.name: DepthOfFieldStrength
property.summary: Gets or sets the Depth of Field strength.

property.name: DepthOfFieldUnknown1
property.summary: Gets or sets an unknown value.

property.name: DepthOfFieldUnknown2
property.summary: Gets or sets an unknown value.

property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: EyeAdaptSpeed
property.summary: Gets or sets the HDR eye adaptation speed.

property.name: EyeAdaptStrength
property.summary: Gets or sets the HDR eye adaptation strength.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

property.name: IsDepthOfFieldSkyDisabled
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the sky is affected by the Depth of Field effect.

property.name: LookupTexture
property.summary: Gets or sets the LUT texture.

property.name: ReceiveBloomThreshold
property.summary: Gets or sets the HDR reveive bloom threshold.

property.name: Saturation
property.summary: Gets or sets the cinematic saturation.

property.name: SkyScale
property.summary: Gets or sets the HDR sky scale.

property.name: SunlightScale
property.summary: Gets or sets the HDR sunlight scale.

property.name: TintAmount
property.summary: Gets or sets the tint amount.

property.name: TintColor
property.summary: Gets or sets the tint color.

property.name: White
property.summary: Gets or sets the HDR white value.

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether this form has been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with the specified text.

type.remarks: The meaning of unknown properties is not known so use them with caution. Unknown properties will be removed and replaced with proper properties as soon as more information is available.
